trans-unit.source: Still a work in progress. This is a javascript library I’ve been developing to allow in place editions of arbitrary DOM objects. It doesn’t do any AJAX by itself but allows the attachment of hooks that can do it. For the input fields it uses a javascript widget system that will allow complex ones to develop. Right now there are available the text field and single selector widgets. Uses Prototype right now, but I might do it “library” agnostic. Works with Opera and Firefox, fails with IE (I don’t know when I’ll fix it, it’s far from being a priority on the project I’m currently working). Check the widget browser!
trans-unit.target: 仍在进行中。这是我一直在开发的JavaScript库，用于允许任意DOM对象的就地版本。它本身不做任何AJAX，但允许附加可以做的钩子。对于输入字段，它使用javascript小部件系统，该系统将允许开发复杂的小部件系统。现在有文本字段和单个选择器小部件可用。现在使用Prototype，但我可以做到“与库无关”。可在Opera和Firefox上运行，而无法在IE上运行（我不知道何时修复它，这远不是我当前正在工作的项目的优先级）。检查小部件浏览器！

trans-unit.source: Wrapper for the InPlace javascript library
